alert.note: Alert for Coastal Chatham; Inland Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CHATHAM AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 432 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Garden City, or near Savannah International Airport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Pooler, Tybee Island, Wilmington Island, Fort Pulaski National Monument, Midtown Savannah, Downtown Savannah, Coffee Bluff and Savannah International Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
